means: 一种泡腾剂式的消食片药品，用于治疗消化不良。

sentence.Network_en: What happened when the alka seltzer was added to the water?
sentence.Network_cn: 当往水里加入苏打水时,会发生什么?

sentence.Network_en: The bottle cap popped off and he got an eyeful of seltzer.
sentence.Network_cn: 瓶盖砰地一声打开,喷得他满眼都是矿泉水.

sentence.Network_en: He gave Jimmy a seltzer on the spot.
sentence.Network_cn: 他递给基米一杯赛尔脱兹矿泉水.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 我可舒适(alka-seltzer)泡腾片，具有解酒功效。宿醉是危险的。

means.word_mean: 1. a commercial antacid; tablets dissolve in water to give an effervescent solution

auth_sentence.content: Seltzer expects a resolution in the case only after a long appeals process.

auth_sentence.content: Suffice it to say that this is not something you notice when you talk to Seltzer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Suffice it to say that this is not something you notice when you talk to Seltzer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Suffice it to say that this is not something you notice when you talk to Seltzer.

auth_sentence.content: Even if the MPAA wanted to sue downloaders, Seltzer said, there would be no grounds to do so.
